Select the TODO

Source: R/drugScreening.R
selectNoReplicateOrganoids.Rd

The function TODO

selectNoReplicateOrganoids(drugScreening, patientInfo)

Arguments

drugScreening

a data.frame that contains the drug screening results. The column is 'organoid_id' is mandatory.

patientInfo

a data.frame containing the meta-data information related to the organoids. The mandatory columns are: 'organoid_id' and 'patient_id'.

Value

a data.frame with the drug screening results filtered to contain with only one organoid per patient. The extra columns from the patient information dataset is added as extra columns to the final dataset.

Author

Astrid Deschênes, Pascal Belleau

Examples


## Load drug screen dataset for 1 drug
data(drugScreening)

## Load patient information dataset for 1 drug
data(patientInfo)

## Set seed to get reproducible results
set.seed(1212)

results <- selectNoReplicateOrganoids(drugScreening=drugScreening,
    patientInfo=patientInfo)

## TODO
